ia.sel

Class RankSelection

  • java.lang.Object
    • ia.sel.RankSelection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Selection
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RankSelectionKeeper

    public class RankSelection
extends java.lang.Object
implements Selection
    Exponential selection, the most effective so far. Selects the individuals based on how well they did compared to the rest : the individuals are sorted, and starting from the first one, they are all given the probability rankSelectProba to be selected to breed; which means the ith indivual has probability rSP*(1-rSP)^i of being selected.

    • Method Detail

      • select

        public Individual[] select(Individual[] population,
                           double mutAmpl,
                           double mutProba)
        Description copied from interface: Selection
        The method called by Genetic to update his population after the previous one died. Calls the crossover method and some mutation.
        Specified by:
        select in interface Selection
        Parameters:
        population - the population to breed to create the new population
        mutAmpl - the amplitude of the mutations
        mutProba - the probability for a mutation to happen
        Returns:
        the new, hopefully better population

      • rankSelecter

        protected static int rankSelecter(int size,
                                  double proba)
        Selects the index of the individual to act as a parent in the rankSelection() methods. Given the rankSelectionProba, it loops while no individual has been chosen by this probability. Please refer to the rankSelection method
        Parameters:
        size - the size of the population - to know where to stop , may no individual be chosen before the last
        proba - the probability to select each individual once their turn has come (plain probability for the 0th individual to be selected)
        Returns:
        the index of the individual that will breed.
